name: s3-versioning-control
description: Webhook to be triggered over a POST on a linked S3. Contacts the Buckaroo miniservice to make sure the last version is being deleted (if more than N versions already on the bucket)
author: Arthur Wallendorff - Metaoist Dsgn

scripts.dev: rm -f test-data/log.txt && sam local invoke -e test-data/event.json -l test-data/log.txt --region eu-central-1 --shutdown
scripts.invoke: npm run build && mv dist/index.js . && rm -f test-data/log.txt && sam local invoke -e test-data/event.json -l test-data/log.txt --region eu-central-1 --shutdown && rm index.js && rmdir dist
